text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/0123cc1e1422003704cc6941916dd75e61fb7976|patch 8.2.2485: when sourcing a script again the script version isn't…>
patch 8.2.2485: when sourcing a script again the script version isn't reset

Problem:    When sourcing a script again the script version isn't reset.
Solution:   Set sn_version to one when sourcing a script again. Clear
            sn_save_cpo properly. (closes #7608)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/dee37dc733df444df1950eb922a35560e4b113d6|patch 8.2.2484: Vim9: Cannot use a comment starting with #{>
patch 8.2.2484: Vim9: Cannot use a comment starting with #{

Problem:    Vim9: Cannot use a comment starting with #{ after an expression.
Solution:   Remove the check for "{" since #{ dictionaries are not supported.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2484: Vim9: Cannot use a comment starting with #{ · vim/vim@dee37dc
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2484: Vim9: Cannot use a comment starting with #{ · vim/vim@dee37dc
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: Cannot use a comment starting with #{ after an expression. Solution: Remove the check for "{" since #{ dictionaries are not supported.

patch 8.2.2483: Vim9: type error for misformed expression

Problem:    Vim9: type error for misformed expression.
Solution:   Check for end of command before checking type. (closes #7795)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2483: Vim9: type error for misformed expression · vim/vim@6628b7e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2483: Vim9: type error for misformed expression · vim/vim@6628b7e
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: type error for misformed expression. Solution: Check for end of command before checking type. (closes #7795)
